info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 8:56AM CDT until July 26 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM CDT FOR LAKE...NORTHEASTERN KANE...MCHENRY AND NORTHWESTERN COOK COUNTIES... At 854 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Spring Grove to Lake in the Hills to near Huntley, moving east southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained Weather Spotter. This storm has had a history of wind gusts up to 60 mph and damage to trees. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Elgin, Waukegan, Arlington Heights, Evanston, Schaumburg, Palatine, Skokie, Des Plaines, Mount Prospect, Hoffman Estates, Glenview, Buffalo Grove, Crystal Lake, Carpentersville, Wheeling, Park Ridge, Northbrook, North Chicago, Gurnee and Mundelein. Including the following interstates... I-90 between mile markers 32 and 50, and between mile markers 60 and 69. I-94 between mile markers 1 and 37. I-294 between mile markers 1 and 37. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
